title: Condo Spotlight | Grove Isle Coconut Grove: Grove Isle is tucked away on a small, private island, and...

attachments.displayName: Condo Spotlight | Grove Isle Coconut Grove: Grove Isle is tucked away on a small, private island, and creates a level of nostalgia that resonates from the surrounding natural elements. Although the area is serene, residents commonly take advantage of its proximity to popular Miami hotspots like South Beach and Brickell. At Grove Isle, residents can partake in a wide variety of activities, like a friendly tennis game on one of the condo’s 11 courts, or slipping away on their yacht from one of their numerous boat docks. If tranquil living and beautiful surroundings are your cup of tea, take a look out these available properties: http://bit.ly/19zDDqv #CondoSpotlight #GroveIsle #LuxuryMiamiCondos #CoconutGroveListings
